text:
[Verse]
Floating on a dream
Catch the sunlight's gleam
Waves beneath my feet
Worlds unseen collide

[Verse 2]
Colors fill the sky
Lose myself I fly
Melodies so high
Feel the rhythm take me

[Chorus]
Drift away
Into the sound
Feeling weightless
Never touch the ground

[Verse 3]
Stars they shine so bright
Guiding through the night
Heartbeats sync with time
Moments feel so right

[Bridge]
Close my eyes and see
Freedom's all I need
Music sets me free
Here with you and me

[Chorus]
Drift away
Into the sound
Feeling weightless
Never touch the ground
title: Drift Away
